name: Be The Hero, ltd.
description:
"Going on a quest? Need some gear? We may not be the hero, but with our help, you can."

You are an employee of Be The Hero ltd. Heroes who are preparing to go on a quest submit an application to us, and we help choose the right gear for them from our storefront. Read their applications, as well as a report we've written up on them, then choose items from the shop. Click on an item to read a description, and a customer review of it! Think about what sort of items they may need, not necessarily what exactly what they say they might need.

Good luck!

[design, programming, art and writing by Dexter McChesney and Calico; made for Bored Pixels Jam 8 in 2021. If you play and enjoy at all before the 30th of july, please give us a rating! any feedback is also greatly appreciated]
